x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: Faster emergency response times, reduced confusion, and more efficient allocation of rescue resources.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: During natural disasters, coordination between citizens, local authorities, and NGOs is often fragmented. There’s a lack of a unified communication and resource management system
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A central platform where citizens can report incidents, request help, and track relief resources in real
time. The platform integrates with government and NGO systems, automating ticket creation and routing
via ServiceNow workflows.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

CSM (Customer Service Management)
Field Service Management
Mobile App Builder
Flow Designer for automated workflows

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Ensuring real-time reliability during disasters and data privacy when handling citizen information.
